ski poles: A ski pole with a built-in GPS tracker that tracks the user's location and provides real-time updates to their smartphone.
Ski pole with built-in camera: A ski pole with a built-in camera that allows users to capture photos and videos of their skiing experience.
Ski pole with built-in speaker: A ski pole with a built-in speaker that allows users to listen to music or receive notifications from their smartphone while skiing.
Ski pole with built-in charger: A ski pole with a built-in charger that allows users to charge their smartphone or other electronic devices while skiing.
Ski pole with built-in GPS tracker and weather app: A ski pole with a built-in GPS tracker and weather app that provides users with real-time weather updates and tracks their skiing experience.
